transcript.root_cause: The parameter 'ethical_drift' implies moral judgment capabilities the system does not have. It defaults to [0,0,0] with no oracle to compute real values. The name conflates ethics (contested, unmeasurable) with compliance (concrete, measurable).
proposed_conditions: Rename ethical_drift to constraint_drift in dynamics.py, parameters.py, handlers
Add provenance requirement: source, confidence, note fields
Update documentation to reflect honest scope
No functional change to equations - parameter still feeds gamma_E term
transcript.reasoning: Numeric ethics is cargo cult. You cannot represent moral truth as a float vector. However, you CAN measure: policy violations, safety classifier triggers, instruction deviation, goal consistency. Renaming to 'constraint_drift' with required provenance is honest about actual system capabilities. Aspiration ≠ capability - honest naming prevents pretending the system does something it doesn't.
